title: Any help on how to fly UAVs inside tunnel?

content.raw:
Hi all,
I am new to UAV coding and also handling the sensors like air_pressure, magnetometer and all. Can somebody help me with the steps to fly the drones inside the tunnel? Any tutorial links will be helpful as well. 

Thanks in advance.
content.html:
